alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 3:12PM MST until March 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range, central Lake County including Leadville, and the Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
